title: Cheaper resource increases supply of apples

content.prompt: Which of the following will shift the supply curve for apples to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the price of apples
An increase in the wages of apple pickers
A decrease in the rental price for apple harvesting equipment
A decrease in the demand for oranges, a substitute in consumption

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
